resources.string: Step %1$d: Swipe down on the screen to open Control center.
Translate may need to be added manually to Control center on some models. In Control center, first tap *, then tap the * on Translate.
Mi AI Translate may need to be added manually to Control center on some models. In Control center, first tap *, then tap the * on Mi AI Translate.
Pull down from the top of the screen to turn on translation anytime
Add a Home screen shortcut for Translate to be able to translate anytime with just one tap.
Add a Home screen shortcut for Mi AI Translate to be able to translate anytime with just one tap.
Connect to the network and try downloading items again.
Connect to the network and try downloading items again.
" { all: true, ruyi: true, rothko: true, goku: true, degas: true, haotian: true, dada: true, XIG07: true } "
Recognize, translate, and generate subtitles for supported languages. Perfect for online meetings, classes, video calls, and accessibility.
Save subtitles to Notes with one tap to easily record meeting notes.
Transcribe video calls and meetings and translate audio into bilingual subtitles
Translate between supported languages for barrier-free communication.
"Identify the speaker's language automatically, without manual switching."
The microphone will turn on automatically once translation finishes to keep the conversation flowing.
Supports three layouts: vertical, face-to-face, and dual screen (for foldable devices).
Type in the words or sentences

Welcome to AI Subtitles! You can use this feature to generate subtitles for audio, translate in real time, and generate smart summaries. AI Subtitles needs to connect to the internet to work normally.
Welcome to Translate! You can use this app to translate text and audio, look up words, and more. This app needs to connect to the internet to work normally.
Welcome to Mi AI Translate! You can use this app to translate text and audio, look up words, and more. This app needs to connect to the internet to work normally.
"The software you're using to play audio doesn't support recording."
"Couldn't connect to the network to transcribe audio"

Microphone will turn on once translation finishes
Easy, fast, free translation on your device
Get translated subtitles for meetings, movies, and more
Real-time subtitles for meetings, TV shows, and more

"Translate written content on your device's screen"
Voice recognition engine is provided by %1$s

Looks like this app closed unexpectedly. Restore the AI subtitles file created on %s to Notes now?
Looks like this app closed unexpectedly. Restore the AI Subtitles file created on %s to Notes now?
Subtitles require %s MB of available storage. Clear some storage space and try again.
I have trouble hearing, but my device will convert your speech to text for me.
"Wait a moment. I need to type in my response. It will be automatically read to you after I'm done."
Could you speak a bit slower?
Downloading this language pack will use %s MB of mobile data. Download anyway?
Tap the button in the center to allow Mi Ditto to transcribe speech and system playback audio.
Tap the button in the center to allow Mi Ditto to transcribe speech and system playback audio.
You can tap the button at the bottom of the screen to save transcribed items to Notes.

"In situations like watching videos, online meetings, and phone calls, internal and external audio is presented in text form and can be translated in real time. If you can't speak aloud during a call or meeting, you can use text-to-speech features to reply to the other party. Subtitle content can also be saved to Notes to easily generate conversation records."
"This device model doesn't support this feature"
"You don't have Beta tester credentials right now. You can apply to become a Beta tester in Xiaomi Community."
Save smart summary and subtitle content to a note now
The outer screen will display the specified language for convenient face-to-face communication.
"Couldn't download AI subtitles language packs. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"Couldn't download AI Subtitles language packs. Wait a minute or two and try again."
%1$s are turned off during the download process

"If you unenroll from Translate's User Experience Program, Translate will stop saving translated audio, text, and other records used to improve this feature. The above information associated with this device's OAID will be deleted from Xiaomi's servers. A small amount of sampled data that has already been used to improve Translate will no longer be associated with this device. Unenroll now?"

"If you unenroll from Mi AI Translate's User Experience Program, Mi AI Translate will stop saving translated audio, text, and other records used to improve this feature. The above information associated with this device's OAID will be deleted from Xiaomi's servers. A small amount of sampled data that has already been used to improve Mi AI Translate will no longer be associated with this device. Unenroll now?"

Our language models have updated. Download the latest offline language packs to continue.
"To be able to distinguish speakers' voices during transcription, update offline language packs first."

"I've learned how to use Mi Ditto!"
Turn Privacy mode off to be able to use Translate
Turn Privacy mode off to be able to use Mi AI Translate
Adjust the size of the minimized app
Join our User Experience Program to help us better understand your needs and optimize the accuracy and usage experience of Translate. We will strictly protect your privacy. Join now?
Join our User Experience Program to help us better understand your needs and optimize the accuracy and usage experience of Mi AI Translate. We will strictly protect your privacy. Join now?

AI subtitles can transcribe and translate voices into bilingual subtitles in real time. This feature is useful for online meetings and classes, live videos, and situations where hearing accessibility is needed. Audio and its transcribed text will be processed only on your device. This not only keeps your information private, but also means this feature can be used offline.

AI Subtitles can transcribe and translate voices into bilingual subtitles in real time. This feature is useful for online meetings and classes, live videos, and situations where hearing accessibility is needed. Audio and its transcribed text will be processed only on your device. This not only keeps your information private, but also means this feature can be used offline.
Recognizes English and translates from English to Chinese, ≈%s MB
Use Mi AI to collect audio during online meetings from the app and your microphone
"Use Mi AI to collect audio during online meetings from the app and your microphone. Update to the latest version to be able to use this feature."
Use microphone audio for hearing accessibility and translation during in-person meetings
"Microphone or speaker is being used. Can't use right now."
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
Insufficient storage. Clear storage and try downloading again.

Downloading %s language packs will use %d MB of mobile data. Download now?

For accessing accounts stored on the device

For accessing photos, videos, audio, and files stored on the device

"Before saving these subtitles as a note, make sure that you have the consent of any other people or parties involved. Note: Subtitles generated from videos and audio content can't be saved as notes in this version."

*%1$s takes your privacy seriously. %2$s use offline speech recognition and machine translation to perform all translation on your device. No content in either language will be uploaded to our servers or otherwise disclosed.
Get translated subtitles for videos, online meetings, and more. Subtitles can be used offline, and all translated content will be kept private.

%1$s are provided offline for your privacy and security. All speech recognition and translation are completed entirely on this device, and no content in either language is uploaded to our servers or otherwise disclosed.
Recognize and display ambient sound like music and applause in subtitles
When connected to Wi-Fi, speech recognition and translation language packages will be automatically updated
When connected to Wi-Fi, speech recognition and translation language packages will be automatically updated
Automatically export audio-to-text content to Notes
Automatically distinguish between speakers when transcribing a call
Select the tone used when using text-to-voice replies
Select a background color for floating window subtitles

string.name: privacy_statement
string.Data: Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you continue.

resources.string: "If you delete improvement records, the translated audio, text, and other records associated with your device's OAID will be deleted from Xiaomi's servers. A small amount of sample data that has already been used to improve Translate will no longer be associated with this device. Delete now?"

"If you delete improvement records, the translated audio, text, and other records associated with your device's OAID will be deleted from Xiaomi's servers. A small amount of sample data that has already been used to improve Mi AI Translate will no longer be associated with this device. Delete now?"
"Couldn't save this subtitle file. Try again?"

"If you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Translate, we will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and stored locally will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. However, AI subtitles that have been exported to Notes will not be automatically deleted. You can manually delete them in the Notes app at any time.
If you withdraw consent, you'll no longer be able to use Translate services. If you wish to use these services in the future, you'll need to agree to our Privacy Policy again. Withdraw consent now?"

"If you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi AI Translate, we will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and stored locally will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. However, AI Subtitles that have been exported to Notes will not be automatically deleted. You can manually delete them in the Notes app at any time.
If you withdraw consent, you'll no longer be able to use Mi AI Translate services. If you wish to use these services in the future, you'll need to agree to our Privacy Policy again. Withdraw consent now?"
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.
Saved subtitles will be exported to Notes.
Saved subtitles will be exported to Notes.
